eventName: The Black Forest Wills A Dream
storyInfo: Magallan applies for a permit to enter the icefield as per usual, but finds that Ursus has abruptly blocked the route. She makes her way through Sami instead, meets her old friend Santalla by an old tree, and hears from different sides about the grudges between Ursus and Sami.

attributes.content: Ursus, Icefield entrance, Wright-Kochinski Scientific Investigation Supply Depot
Phew— Finally here.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: *beep* *beep* Please enter passphrase.
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: *ahem*—Columbian Billy Bro, Ursus Cautus Dossoles, Horosho!
attributes.name: Magallan
Device
attributes.content: Verifying passphrase...

attributes.name: Device
attributes.content: Confirmed. Xорошо, Columbian.

attributes.name: Device
attributes.content: Verifying speaker...

attributes.name: Device
attributes.content: Confirmed.
Rhine Lab, serial number CRL005—
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: (Strange tone) My-ma-meh-ma-ah~gah~lan~
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Welcome to the Wright-Kochinski Scientific Investigation Supply Depot.
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Hmm—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Fishes out notebook) 'Audio system in Ursus W-K station is slightly damaged—'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: '—Maintenance unnecessary for now.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That should do.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Professor Mary's team probably took enough supplies for, let's see, one, two, three... twenty people?!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Twenty people's worth of supplies for a team of fifteen...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Fishes out notebook) 'Only five percent of supplies remaining, enough for ten people (excluding myself)—requires restocking.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Now what else—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Structure... shows no signs of damage. Energy... no recharge needed. Life support equipment... still good, temperature's alright.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: First aid kits appear to be unused, doors and windows show no sign of external damage...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And finally...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Operates supply depot equipment)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Yup, that's the route.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Confirms signals returning from outposts along the route)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The routine reports along the way suggest they didn't run into any trouble.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Two months ago
Columbia, Trimounts, Rhine Lab Headquarters, Scientific Investigation Section
Alright, I'll prepare to depart then. Anything else you need me for?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That should be all.
attributes.name: Scientific Investigation Section Member

attributes.content: (Quietly) There's one last thing, but you can't tell anyone.
attributes.name: Scientific Investigation Section Member

attributes.content: Huh? Sure, I can keep a secret.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Glances around)
attributes.name: Scientific Investigation Section Member

attributes.content: (Quietly) Director Maryam's team went missing in the icefield.
attributes.name: Scientific Investigation Section Member

attributes.content: Huh?! What happened to Professor Mary—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Wmmmph!!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Quietly) Keep it down!
attributes.name: Scientific Investigation Section Member

attributes.content: Mmf, mrrmrmff.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Quietly) Anyway, that's the gist of it.
attributes.name: Scientific Investigation Section Member

attributes.content: (Quietly) So your top priority on this trip is to find and rescue the Director's team.
attributes.name: Scientific Investigation Section Member

attributes.content: (Quietly) The Exploration Society's already organizing their own search and rescue, but I'm sure you know how inefficient they always are.
attributes.name: Scientific Investigation Section Member

attributes.content: (Quietly) So... you're the only one they can count on.
attributes.name: Scientific Investigation Section Member

attributes.content: (Quietly) Got it.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Operates supply depot equipment)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The other outposts seem normal.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Which means they're still together.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That, or...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: A signal from a Columbian outpost?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Operates supply depot equipment)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Picks up receiver)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: This is @#￥-bian base—
We're under￥!@%&! Need... #￥!
Coordinates—
A signal sent by Professor Mary himself... Which means he should still be there!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But it would take some time for the signal to travel all the way here...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Pats her own cheeks)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: First things first, Magallan.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Presses console button)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: *Beep beep*
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: CRL005, Magallan.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Identity verified. How may I help you?
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Give me both the outgoing and incoming signal logs from Columbia in the last three or so months, thanks.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Confirmed. Beginning encrypted callbacks to Messenger Outpost.
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: (Switches console off)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Ursus uses the base station established by the Exploration Society too, so that'll be convenient for applying for an icefield entry permit...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I can go as soon as the Messenger from Ursus gets here to confirm the documents.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm on my way, Professor, so stay out of any serious trouble.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That was fast— Please give me a moment, I'll be right there!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hi there.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Miss Venta Magallan.
Is this Mr. Ivan?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Yes, on business as usual.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: One sec, I'll open the door for you.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hello, Mr. Ivan. Would you like to take a rest inside?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You know the rules, Miss Magallan. If I take even half a step forward, we'll never hear the end of it from the Columbians.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: It's just us here. Who's gonna know?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Your little machine is already keeping a close eye on us.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Between you and me, the systems here aren't as smart as you'd think, haha.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Still, better to be safe than sorry when dealing with the Columbians.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Not that I don't trust you, of course. But allow me to decline your kind invitation out of an abundance of caution.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Now then, if you could show me your documents?
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Hyup.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That should be all of them.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hm... entry permit... expedition permit... expedition route confirmation... cartography commission...
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Very good, Miss Magallan, everything seems to be in order.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Phew—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That said, I have some unfortunate news for you—
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: All icefield expedition permits this year have been cancelled.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Wha?!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That's, but... the documents should all be...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I doubt this is the first time you've experienced this, so please try to understand our situation.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: But I have to go, it's urgent. Could... Could you please manage some kind of workaround?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's not impossible, if you can tell me why.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Really?!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Really.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: So the thing is, we have a missing team out there and I need to find them, or at least confirm their situation.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: There are lives at stake here, so whatever conditions there are, I'll agree to them after I find them.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Then you should have reported this through official channels and waited for an Ursus rescue team. Why set out on your own?
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: I understand, I really do, but an official rescue team needs time to prepare, right?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm an explorer too—one pretty familiar with the icefield if I do say so myself—and finding them even a day earlier will make the follow-up rescue that much simpler.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Also...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Then do you mind sharing the missing group's last known coordinates?
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Eh? Oh, okay, just give me a moment.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: They should be around here.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: (Ursine dialect) I've obtained the Columbians' coordinates. Based on them, they likely have something to do with what's happening in the north.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: (Ursine dialect) Very good.
(Ursine dialect) What do we do with the girl?
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: (Ursine dialect) She's supposedly a veteran explorer from Columbia, but her importance to the country is unclear. Keep an eye on her and await further instructions.
(Ursine dialect) Understood.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Mr. Ivan...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I just confirmed with my colleagues. My apologies, Miss Magallan, but we still can't let you head any further north.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: The front is under military control, so it's out of my hands.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But to make up for it, I can accompany you anywhere within Ursus territory. My status as an Ursus official should simplify things for you.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Let me think then...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh right, Sami!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No one would block me if I entered the icefield through Sami, right?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: In theory, yes. However—
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Then let's go to Sami first!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm all ready, Mr. Ivan. Please take me there now.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Ursine dialect) She wants to enter the icefield through Sami. Do you have enough time to run a background check?
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: (Ursine dialect) Just do what she wants. Investigating a Columbian with a public identity won't take long.
(Ursine dialect) When you reach the border, the guards will send someone to take over your job.
(Ursine dialect) Roger.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: (Ursine dialect) Be careful not to let the Witch spot you.
(Ursine dialect) Understood.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: As you wish, Miss Magallan.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Captain, a moment please.
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: You have a question, soldier?
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: Yes, Captain. Regarding... our mission.
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: You have concerns about the military's arrangements?
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: No, sir. I wouldn't dare. I was only thinking, about how we treat the Sami—
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: You pity those creatures?
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: Yes, Captain. I think—
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: Wait, what did you just say?
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: I can understand your sympathy.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: Let me ask you a question though, soldier.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: As I recall, you're the son of a farmer.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: Yes, Captain.
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: Then, on your family's land, you must breed burdenbeasts. You use them to pull your carts, and otherwise create value as your father demands.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: Do you think those burdenbeasts would have done any of that on their own, without your father to tame them?
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: Of course not, Captain.
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: So what makes you think the Sami would?
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: But, Captain—
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: After the Ursus people overthrew the Hippogryph's rule, they spent a millennium transforming the land into what Ursus needed it to be.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: And yet Sami remains a desolate woodland.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: The Sami have contributed nothing to civilization.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: I believe that with proper guidance, they will eventually come to understand the painstaking efforts Ursus has made here.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: We've brought them the fire of civilization, so they should be shedding tears of gratitude.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: Yet their response, well, I believe it goes without saying.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: Yes, Captain.
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: They understand only strength, and more civilized means of persuasion fall on deaf ears.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: As such, violence is a necessary evil.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: But when their descendants are living in sturdy homes and enjoying the products of Ursus culture...
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: —Then they'll understand.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: Understood, Captain.
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: Reporting in. A group of Sami sighted ahead, engaged in combat with the demons.
attributes.name: 'Scout'

attributes.content: Get in formation, and have the Caster team ready their Arts.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: 'Scout'

attributes.content: Captain, you...
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: Not even a disobedient burdenbeast deserves to be devoured by starving beasts, wouldn't you agree?
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: All units, prepare to attack the demons.
attributes.name: 'Captain'

attributes.content: —Yes, sir!
attributes.name: 'Soldier'

attributes.content: One week later, Sami-Ursus border
Just a little further, and we'll reach the border sentry outpost. And Sami is a short trek from there.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: This is as far as I can accompany you.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: It's been a whole lot easier communicating with anyone from Ursus with you around.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Your Ursine isn't bad, although your accent is thick.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: I doubt I'll be fixing that anytime soon, heh.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And I still have a lot to learn. Sometimes I can't understand a word you're saying, Mr. Ivan.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's an obscure regional dialect. Not even other Ursus can understand me sometimes.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: I could teach you some on your next visit, if you're not so busy next time.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Really? That'd be wonderful, thanks!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Ha, you're very welcome.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: By the way, are you particularly familiar with Sami?
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Well, I've never used this route before, so not really.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But I've heard it takes just as many supplies to get through Sami as it does to enter the icefield, and there are fewer outposts there as you get nearer to the icefield, so restocking is difficult too.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Indeed, it is a savage place.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: You don't seem to like it much, Mr. Ivan.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Normally, there is a permanent garrison at every outpost on the Ursus border, but the Sami-Ursus border only has regular patrols. Can you guess why?
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Does... Ursus have some sort of dispute with Sami?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Dispute? The Sami invaded Ursus territory and attacked our soldiers, all to satisfy their malicious, primitive desires.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Even the sentry outpost up ahead was once occupied by the Sami for no reason at all. We even so kindly helped them repel the demons before issuing a protest to reclaim our territory.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: But they refused to leave, and even harmed our soldiers. In the end we had no choice but to drive them out with force.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Is that so...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Is that so...?)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The barbarous Sami exacted their revenge by sending out a vengeful spirit we call the Witch.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: She killed every last soldier at the outpost, and has been wandering the border ever since.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Whenever she runs across a small squad, she'll engulf them in a snowstorm before going in for the kill, but if she meets a larger force she'll hide in the wind and snow.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: We can neither get rid of her nor chase her away. A real thorn in our side.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: In the end, our only option is to strengthen the border defenses with an elite patrol squad, simply to prevent the Sami from wreaking further havoc.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: You must also be careful when passing through Sami.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: The moment they spot an outsider, they will not stop until they rip out your throat to sip on your blood.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Like the wild beasts swarming the snowfield, we can only keep them in check by force.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Am I clear?
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Y-Yeah, you're clear.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: It's windy out here. Let's hurry to the outpost and get some rest.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Is the monster still there?!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: It's been driven off, so we should be safe for now.
attributes.name: Sami Shaman

attributes.content: Phew... wonderful.
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Hey, friends from Ursus! How is the situation over there?!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: No casualties on our end.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Freya, do you still have any extra water? Bring some for our Ursus friends.
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: At once.
attributes.name: Sami Shaman

attributes.content: Phew. That was a little dangerous earlier. If you guys haven't helped out, some of our fledglings here might already be on their way to meet the ancestors.
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Please, there's no need for that. We share a common enemy.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Where are you people headed to next?
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: We just happened to be passing by while performing our military duties.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: The people of Ursus sure are stiff. We just fought demons, and you're still thinking about these 'military duties' of yours. Your brothers must be exhausted.
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Come rest at our camp. Warm yourselves by the fire, and have some dried meat before hitting the road again, friend.
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Then... I suppose it would be rude to refuse.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Hahahaha. There's no need to be so polite.
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Freya, where's that water?!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: I'm still patching someone up, give me a moment!
attributes.name: Sami Shaman

attributes.content: Forget about it then, we're bringing them back to camp for drinks!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Santalla!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: What wrong?!
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Double-check that there are no more demons in the area, while I take the wounded and our Ursus friends back to camp!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Got it, then I'll return when I'm done. Remember to leave me a spot under the tree!
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: But of course.
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Get up, kiddos! Time to head home!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Listen up, soldiers.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Advance in formation.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Is this really a sentry outpost? It's so spacious!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And this tree smack dab in the center. Does Ursus have a custom of planting trees in the middle of buildings, Mr. Ivan?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It was planted by the Sami, and has been dead for a long time.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: But fortunately it's sturdy enough to act as a much needed barrier out here in the snowfield. So we decided to let it stand rather than cutting it down for firewood.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: There aren't any other trees in a hundred miles. So why would they randomly plant one right in the middle of the snowfield?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I wouldn't know.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Can I... collect some samples?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: By all means.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: (Ursine dialect) We've arrived at the dead tree outpost; the Witch has not bothered us.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: (Ursine dialect) We've finished our investigation into the girl, too. Her background is unremarkable, but we can make use of her expertise.
(Ursine dialect) The border guards will move to your position as soon as they can. They'll take the girl and pass her on to the investigation team, who need someone to guide them across the icefield.
(Ursine dialect) Your role ends there.
(Ursine dialect) Understood. I'll go ahead and prepare the signal beacon to connect at any time.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: (Ursine dialect) My apologies, little one.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: My apologies, 'friend.'
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: What are you doing?! Lower your weapons!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: My duty is to expand our territory for His Majesty the Emperor.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: From today onwards, this too is Ursus territory.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: No, what? What exactly do you mean?!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Did I not make myself clear, barbarian?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: This is the only settlement within a hundred kilometers. Once we occupy it, great Ursus will naturally be the master of this land.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: As this is now Ursus territory, I must request that you leave.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: We've been living here for ages, while all you've done is plant a flag! What grounds do you have to claim this land as yours?!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Because we're here now. No more reason is needed.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Hmm... In honor of our friendship and mutual assistance against the demons, I'll give each of you two choices. Leave this place at once, or become subjects of Ursus.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: You and your people are excellent warriors, so our nation will gladly welcome you.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Of course, you must learn to speak Ursine, wear Ursus clothing, and most importantly, abandon your abominable and heretical beliefs.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: You!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: (Silently mouths a spell)
attributes.name: Sami Shaman

attributes.content: Caster, shut that witch up.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Sami Shaman

attributes.content: Freya!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: Don't do anything foolish, and don't even think about resisting.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: (Speaking in Sami) O old tree, I plead you bear witness in my stead...
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: HEAAAAARGH!!!!!
attributes.name: Sami Warrior

attributes.content: You leave me no choice, 'friend.'
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: All units, attack.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: (Ursine dialect) Please speak.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: (Ursine dialect) The wind from the direction of the border guards seems off, so there might be an incoming snowstorm. Find an open space to deploy a signal beacon for them, and upon making contact, take the target and leave the area immediately.
(Ursine dialect) Understood.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: I see you're done collecting samples.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: This tree has some amazing properties. Biologically speaking, it's completely withered. But what's strange is how parts of it still feel alive and well.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: With more thorough research, I might even be able to publish a whole paper on it.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: A great blessing to academia, no doubt.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: But there's a snowstorm coming, so you'd better go shelter in the outpost first.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Ah, gotcha.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You're not joining me, Mr. Ivan?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm going to go check the scale of the storm, so that if the weather worsens we'll still have a chance to send for help.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Oh, okay.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Please, have some of this before you go.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I just heated up some water, so have a cup to warm yourself up.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That's alright, I'll be right back.
attributes.name: Ivan

attributes.content: Mr. Ivan...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Wait, why am I hiding in here by the fire while he's hard at work outside? That doesn't seem right...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm an explorer, aren't I? How can I let my companion face this alone?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Maybe I should—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: So cold...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Looks towards window)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oww, my face hurts...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The wind's picking up.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You need to be careful, Mr. Ivan.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That's...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Mr. Ivan?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No, that's not, that's—?!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: A gust of wind kicks up waves of snow, pouring towards the outpost.
However, the waves seem to advance only sluggishly, at a controlled speed. As if commanded to do so.
This is not an optical illusion caused by the distance, but the wind and snow are indeed following orders.
They dare not let even a snowflake overtake their leader without permission.
And she, currently leading the wind's charge, holds her scepter high as she slowly makes her way towards the outpost.
One step, then another.
Smooth, steady, unquestionable.
Until the land is buried beneath the wind and snow.
Or so it might have gone. But Magallan welcomes this scene, more than anyone else on the northern frontier.
Because the woman walking amongst the ice and snow is her best friend on the icefield.
Simone!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: As her shout travels across the snow, Magallan clearly feels the wind subside.
The waves of snow behind Simone vanish without a trace as she walks up to Magallan.
Hello, Magallan.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Shouldn't you be out on an icefield expedition? What brings you here?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: A professor I respect has gone missing out there, but Ursus blocked the route, again. So I have to take the long way around.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I warmed up some tea, want some?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Why, thank you.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: *glug*...*glug*...
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Phew—
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: So, you want to enter the icefield from Sami.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Ah, right. Simone, you're a Sami, right?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That I am.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Then you—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: How could I possibly not help out a good acquaintance?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Ehehe~
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Okay, then I'll say goodbye to Mr. Ivan when he gets back, and then we can head into Sami.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Although I've heard it's kinda primitive there, and really scary.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Is that... what the Ursus Messenger told you?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: He also said there's a witch around here who attacks people for no reason, so I should be careful.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The Ursus are all like that.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: So what kind of person do you imagine this witch to be?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Hmm... a little scary, just like this tree.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: *sigh* Mr. Ivan really seems to loathe Sami, though.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: He was so upfront about it, too.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Us Sami hate the Ursus just as much.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: But why? Couldn't you just talk out this misunderstanding?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Because to them, conquest is far simpler than understanding. They may see just one annoying witch, but countless Sami have already—
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: —No, it's getting late. Where did you say your friend was headed?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: North, towards the snowstorm.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Wait here, I'll go help him out.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: I think it's better if we go together—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Stay put, Magallan.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: You're safer in here.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: O-Okay then...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Be careful out there, Simone.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Um, and be careful of the witch, yeah?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hah. If she does show up, I'll be sure to stay far away from her.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: In the meantime, could you warm up some more tea?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Mmhmm!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And now I'm all alone, again.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I hope Mr. Ivan and Simone can get along out there...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What do you think, Mr. Tree?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The ancient, dead tree responds with silence.
I still don't get it. How can they fight off a common enemy together one minute, and go for each other's throats the next?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Isn't cooperation obviously the better choice?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The venerable tree ponders for a moment, and decides to answer by smacking its withered branches together.
What about you, Mr. Tree? Did you come here to this snowfield all on your own because other people couldn't understand you?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The towering tree feels the question is difficult to answer, so chooses to remain silent.
You're right... that was a stupid question.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But if possible, I still hope we can—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm back.
Simone?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh, here's your tea.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: So where's Mr. Ivan?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I looked where you told me to, but couldn't find the Messenger you mentioned.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The storm from the north is close.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Perhaps he's already rendezvoused with the border guards he called for help, and taken refuge with them.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Ursus sentry outposts aren't sturdy enough to withstand a snowstorm this strong. This building will be completely crushed.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: We might also want to...
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Can we... wait just a bit longer? Mr. Ivan is a pretty experienced Messenger, and we've known each other a long time, so I don't think he'd be caught by a snowstorm like this.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: If you insist. Just a bit longer.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: I'll let the old tree know that we're safe.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The old tree... Simone, are you from around here?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It used to be my duty to protect this unchanging old tree.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: It may have transcended death, but failed to be remembered.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: And to think all this happened because of a moment of kind-heartedness.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: We sow goodwill only to reap evil. This is how the land does things.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: So, that's why there's a... witch roaming nearby.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Perhaps.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: It's about time. We'll be trapped in here if we don't get moving.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: What are you doing?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Finding a spot protected from the wind, to leave a mark for him.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I have to at least let him know I made it out safely.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hmm... that should do it.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm leaving, Mr. Ivan.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Goodbye.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Let's go, Magallan.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The wind and snow seem so docile when I'm with you, Simone.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Just a little Arts I happen to know.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Hmm... That communicator on your shoulder... I feel like I've seen it somewhere before.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: This? I bought it from the Ursus. It works quite well.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Do you need one?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: I'm good. Columbian communicators are way easier to use than Ursus ones.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Ah... Simone?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: There's something... I need to apologize to you for. I hope you won't get angry.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I won't know until I hear it.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Erm, so earlier, at the sentry outpost, I got a little excited and took some samples from Mr. Tree.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Did you harm the old tree?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: N-No, the thing is, I did intend to make a hole to collect a sample, but as soon as I touched it, it just dropped two pieces of bark.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: So really, I didn't—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Bark?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Yeah, please don't get mad. I didn't doodle on it or anything.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: May I... see them?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Eh? O-Okay.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Tries putting the pieces of bark together)
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: (Gydia...)
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: (Heillir...?)
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: (Thank you. Thank you so much.)
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: What is it, Simone?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh, nothing...
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Keep these with you. The old tree won't blame you for it.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Thank you, Mr. Tree.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Yes, praise be the old tree.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The snowstorm will be here soon, so we need to hurry and find somewhere suitable to spend the night.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Santalla
